name: VR Guy's Bizzare Adventure
description:
hello! this my very first game made with unity. if there any bugs please let me know in the comments. 

you wake up in a 2-d world. you dont know where you are but you think you know how you got here.  the vr headset. you dont know how to escape but your best guess is to beat the game. there are many challenges ahead and many sinister foes who look for your demise. 

controls:

W , D and the left and right arrow keys to move left or right. 

space bar or up arrow to jump.

left shift for the sword. 

and right shift to go invisble. 

ENJOY!
